Nov. 6, 2004 D US Open Brass Band Championships
US Open Brass Band Championships 0 Entertainments Contest
us-open-brass-band-championships
First Contest 2003.
St. Viator High School, Arlington Heights, Illinois, USA Most entertaining band: Brass Band of Central Florida Best featured brass soloist: Lee Harrelson (euphonium, Fountain City Brass Band) Best performance of a march: Brass Band of Central Florida (playing Centaur) Best new composition or arrangement: Bolero (Ravel arr Michael Garasi) (played by Brass Band of Central Florida)
Individual awards adjudicated by Alan Wycherley
June 5, 2009, 1:07 p.m. Oct. 15, 2014, 10:29 a.m.
1 Brass Band of Central Florida Michael J. Garasi
2 Fountain City Brass Jason Reinhart
3 Dearham Band Mark Condron
4 Prairie Brass Band Dallas Niermeyer
5 Motor City Brass Band Craig Strain
6 Illinois Brass Band Peter Lipari
